title: Bissell® CleanView Swivel Vacuum with Triple Action Brush Roll, Swivel Steering, Extension Wand, Easy-Empty Dirt Tank, Multi-Cyclonic Suction System, New 2024 Model
description: BISSELL® CleanView® Swivel Pet Upright Vacuum offers outstanding performance and convenience for pet familiat a great price. Effortlessly reach up to 12 feet while cleaning with the Active Extension Wand. The swivel feature maximizes maneuverability so you can easily clean around furniture in your home. Pick up messes with the powerful combination of the Triple Action™ Brush Roll and Scatter-Free Technology, which keeps the debris contained. Plus, spend more time cleaning and less time emptying your dirt container with the XL Easy Empty™ Dirt Tank. Along with these features, the CleanView® Swivel Pet Upright Vacuum comes with specialized pet tools to help ensure your pet friendly home stays clean. BISSELL proudly supports BISSELL Pet Foundation® and its mission to help save homeless pets. When you buy a BISSELL® product, you help save pets, too. We’re proud to design products that help make pet messes, odors and pet homelessness disappear.
